user_query: My company is organizing a team-building event in the countryside. We need to arrange transportation for all employees. Can you suggest some pet foods that are suitable for cats? Additionally, provide us with a calculator to estimate the total cost of the event, including transportation, accommodation, and meals.

TaskList.description: Gather the list of employees who will attend the event.
Research and suggest suitable transportation options for all employees based on the gathered list.
Calculate transportation costs based on the chosen transportation options.
Estimate accommodation costs based on the number of employees and duration of stay.
Estimate meal costs based on the number of employees and the selected meal options.
Calculate the total event cost combining transportation, accommodation, and meals.
Research and provide suitable cat food options.
